member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO structure contains either source mode or target mode information.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO.infoType
member.summary: A value that indicates whether the DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO structure represents source or target mode information. If infoType is DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_TARGET, the targetMode parameter value contains a valid DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_MODE structure describing the specified target. If infoType is DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_SOURCE, the sourceMode parameter value contains a valid DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE structure describing the specified source.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO.id
member.summary: The source or target identifier on the specified adapter that this path relates to.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO.adapterId
member.summary: The identifier of the adapter that this source or target mode information relates to.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.targetMode
member.summary: A valid structure that describes the specified target only when infoType is DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_TARGET.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.sourceMode
member.summary: A valid structure that describes the specified source only when infoType is DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_SOURCE.
